document_data.name: Beluir
document_data.mainbody: '''Beluir''' was the largest city (usually considered the capital) of the [[halfling]] realm of [[Luiren]] it also housed foreign dignitaries. Its was also known for having the largest [[Yondalla]] temple in Luiren, and so also the home of the Devout Voice of Yondalla.
document_data.Geography: Beluir was located on the shore of [[Luirenstrand|Luirenstrand Bay]] in the [[Great Sea]].
document_data.Defence:
The city is well defended by about a cohort of [[warders|marchwardens]] as well as a large group of militia. The marchswardens would use skirmishing tactics to surround and ultimately destroy a besieging army. The Mayor of the town is known to have slain two [[Hill giant]]s on his own, they may have been drunk but he's still a fighter of renown.
There was a network of portals leading to the temple of [[Sheela Peryroyl]] from all over the country that had a garrison of fighters and priests.[http://archive.wizards.com/default.asp?x=dnd/pg/20031112a]
There were an order of swaying Halflings calling them self's Hin blades of [[Brandobaris]] that were based in the city. These trouble coursers came out to defend the realm whenever needed.http://archive.wizards.com/default.asp?x=dnd/frcc/20070911
document_data.Resources: The city had many farmlands and fruit farms nearby.

Notable locations.Temple of Yondalla: Led by the Devout Voice of Yondalla, the religious leader and thus ''de facto'' civil leader of Luiren.
Notable locations.Temple of Sheela Peryroyl: This temple held a network of 8 one way portals that took wagons of food from other places of Luiren as far as near the border of [[Shoun]]. As well as a contingency of guards and priests.

document_data.Business:
Most "Big folk" sized businesses are by the docks like "Erdel’s Extraordinary Equipment Emporium" and many types of hostels, taverns and inns. The docks of the city had a brisk shipping trade and the city also has a lot of homes for foreigners and their dignitaries. 
====Taverns====
Beluir has many taverns some famous:
*[[Friendly Burrow]] - Burrow family owned tavern.
*[[the Red Burrow]] - Burrow family owned tavern.
*[[the Cold Duck]] - Burrow family owned tavern/inn, famous for the delicacy that inspired its name also has rooms for big folk.
====Stores====
*[[Erdel’s Extraordinary Equipment Emporium]] A store catering to "Big folk" who's owner also was the leader of the local thieves guild.
